mapper.select: select pl.id, pl.match_info_id as matchInfoId, pl.order as `order`, pl.player_id as playerId, pl.player_name as playerName, pl.team_id as teamId, pl.position_id as positionId, innings, hits, runs, earned_run, bb, so, homeruns, np, decision, (SELECT round((sum(earned_run) * 27)/sum((truncate(innings,0) * 3 + round(MOD(innings,1),1) * 10)), 2) FROM pitcher_record where player_id = pl.player_id group by player_id) as era from pitcher_lineup pl inner join pitcher_record pr on pr.id = pl.id where pl.match_info_id = #{matchInfoId} and pl.team_id = #{teamId};

SELECT pl.order as `order`, pl.position_id as positionId, p.id as playerId, p.name as name, p.team_id as teamId, p.uniform_number as uniformNumber, p.hand as hand, pl.id as id FROM pitcher_lineup pl left join player p on p.id = pl.player_id where pl.match_info_id = #{matchInfoId} and p.team_id = #{teamId} and pl.position_id = 1;
